00021 namespace chain
00022 {
00023   #define DECLARE_CHAIN_CLASS(OBJTYPE,PARENT,TYPENAME)    \
00024     public:                                               \
00025     static COb::eType GetType () {                        \
00026       return OBJTYPE;                                     \
00027     };                                                    \
00028     static std::string GetTypeName () {                   \
00029       return TYPENAME;                                    \
00030     };                                                    \
00031     static bool IsType (const COb::eType& _type) {        \
00032       if(_type != OBJTYPE) return PARENT::IsType(_type);  \
00033       else return true;                                   \
00034     };
